title: aac报错
author: tjx65448479
txt_content: aac总是在检测到有人开挂的时候出现could not pass events 然后就开始刷屏报错，核心sp188

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
反对一下楼上这种什么都更新的行为。。
Server Version
AAC v3.0+ supports Spigot versions 1.8.8, 1.9.4, 1.10.x, 1.11.0, 1.11.2, 1.12 (ViaVersion supported)Prior to AAC v3.0, each version of Minecraft had a unique resource jar. If you choose to stick with older builds (not recommended or supported), find your unique build download in AAC's Version History.
1.8.8: AAC v1.9.10
1.9.4: AAC v2.0.1
1.10: AAC v2.1.1
1.11: None, use v3.0+
1.8.8使用1.9.10版本
